posts.message: Trying to find out if Xamarin development on iOS or Android is common or rare in Egypt. Anyone here develop in #Xamarin?

Facebook announced its new bot platform for messenger few hours ago. I've created a hubot adapter for it, if anyone is interested.
For those who don't know what hubot is, check https://hubot.github.com/ . Github, for instance, uses hubot for everything including staging and deployments. It's cool, check it out :D

https://github.com/MohamedBassem/hubot-messenger-platform
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: hubot-messenger-platform - A hubot adapter for the new messenger platform
